translations.translation: This is nothing but a revelation that is conveyed to him,
It is a revelations which has been revealed to him
It is but a divine revelation, which is revealed to him.
It is only a revelation revealed.
It is naught but revelation that is revealed,
This is naught but a revelation revealed,
It is naught save an inspiration that is inspired,
It [the Quran] is nothing but revelation sent down to him.
It is but a revelation revealed.
it is just a revelation that is revealed [to him],
It is no less than inspiration sent down to him:
It is only an Inspiration that is inspired.
Indeed it is not except a Revelation which is revealed,
It is but a revelation revealed.
It is not but a revelation revealed,
[53:4] It is but a revelation that is revealed, to him,
(It is) i.e. the Qur'an (naught save an inspiration) from Allah (that is inspired) to him through Gabriel who comes and recites it to him,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنْ هُوَ } أي: ما القرآن الذي ينزل إليه صلى الله عليه وسلم ويتكلم هو به { إِلاَّ وَحْيٌ يُوحَىٰ } [النجم: 4] إليه من عند ربه، بلا تصنع له فيه، وتكلف من جانبه
